title: Can all chat be disabled in bronze?
body: So gosh darn sick of "muh diamond smurf yasuo main" talking in all chat incessantly. I know you can mute it but like there isnt really a point for all chat other than gl hf and gg. Maybe i am reaching but my god its annoying to see people bicker in all chat

replies.body:
u can disable all chat in the options

also im a diamond smurf yas main

You crave the typing otherwise you would have muted him/ turn off all chat.

Good try though.

/mute all 

Is it really that hard?
